page.title: Interactive Atlas of Heart Disease and Stroke
page.content: Interactive Atlas of Heart Disease and Stroke Print Minus Related Pages CDC’s Interactive Atlas of Heart Disease and Stroke is an online mapping tool that allows users to create and customize county-level maps of heart disease and stroke by race and ethnicity, gender, age group, and more. Launch the Interactive Atlas Select one of the buttons below to view a map of the complete US, or select a state/territory in the map or from the dropdown below. US Map selection buttons US Map - County Level US Map - State Level View Tables by Geographic Area or Report Data Sample Maps How to Use the Atlas Data Sources Statistical Methods Citation Recommended Citation: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. Interactive Atlas of Heart Disease and Stroke. http://nccd.cdc.gov/DHDSPAtlas. Accessed on [insert date]. Last Reviewed: May 23, 2023 Source: National Center for Chronic Disease Prevention and Health Promotion , Division for Heart Disease and Stroke Prevention Interactive Atlas of Heart Disease and Stroke Print Minus Related Pages CDC’s Interactive Atlas of Heart Disease and Stroke is an online mapping tool that allows users to create and customize county-level maps of heart disease and stroke by race and ethnicity, gender, age group, and more. Launch the Interactive Atlas Select one of the buttons below to view a map of the complete US, or select a state/territory in the map or from the dropdown below. US Map selection buttons US Map - County Level US Map - State Level View Tables by Geographic Area or Report Data Sample Maps How to Use the Atlas Data Sources Statistical Methods Citation Recommended Citation: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. Interactive Atlas of Heart Disease and Stroke. http://nccd.cdc.gov/DHDSPAtlas. Accessed on [insert date]. Español | Other Languages
